title: Dad And Me Setting Farts Free: A Funny Read Aloud Picture Book For Fathers And Their Kids, A Rhyming Story For Families
description: New Father's Day Gift For 2021!Does your dad fart? Of course he does! This silly rhyming story will have you bursting with laughter and the little bear tries to be just like his dad.This book is appropriate for ALL AGES who don't mind silly toot humor (that is not overly gross). Words used toot, fart, gas, rump, booty and bum.Grab this new release in time for the gift giving season!8.5" x 8.5"Premium glossy coverHilarious (and familiar) fart situations around the houseFull color, professional illustrationsAn easy quick gift for dad from the kids (and kids at heart)
author: Jane Bexley
